answer:
In order to assess your eligibility for the shingles vaccine (if you can safely get this vaccine), please discuss your immunizing health care provider (public health nurse, physician or pharmacist). Learn about the shingles vaccines here.
Immunization Nurse
question: I am a 68 year old healthy female who has celiac disease as well as being lactose intolerant. Should I be concerned about receiving the shingles vaccine?
question_variation_1: who is concerned about shingles vaccine
question_variation_2: is the shingles vaccination a vaccine
